body.name: DOWAN Utensil Holder, 360° Rotating Extra Large Cooking Utensil Holder, 7.2" Kitchen Utensil Holder for Countertop, Utensil Crock for Farmhouse Kitchen Decor, Ceramic Stable Utensil Caddy, Blue
features: 360° ROTATING: Never fumble for the right utensil again with our extra-large utensil holder for kitchen counter that rotates 360 degrees for easy access.
DEEP & LARGE: Our utensil crock is deep and large enough to hold more than 20 cooking utensils, keeping your kitchen organized and clutter-free.
STABLE AND FALL-PREVENTION: Our stable utensil caddy has a weighted bottom to prevent tip-overs and ensure your utensils stay upright and easily accessible.
MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS: Our versatile kitchen utensil holder can also be used as a planter, vase, or even a wine freezer, making it the perfect addition to any farmhouse kitchen decor.
EASY TO CLEAN AND PERFECT GIFT: Our ceramic utensil holder is easy to clean and makes a perfect gift for any home chef or kitchen enthusiast.
body.description: Dowan Extra Large Utensil Holder, Keep Your Kitchen Tidy and Clean A Convenient Solution for Overflowing Kitchen Drawers and Countertop Clutter 360°Rotating Base: The utensil holder has "lazy susan" functionality so you can quickly spin the bucket to find the tool you need. Free up Your Drawer Space: DOWAN kitchen utensil holder can store whisks, spatulas, and other cooking utensils within reach without cluttering the countertop. Lazy Susan Caddy 7.6″ Large for 20+ Cooking Utensils Weighted Bottom and No tip over Easy to Clean with Only A Cloth

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We believe that tableware should lead to a balanced lifestyle. That's why DOWAN is created. Material: Ceramic Dimensions: 7.6" H x 6.2" W Color: Blue Capacity: 20+ Cooking Utensils Dowan Extra Large Utensil Holder, Keep Your Kitchen Tidy and Clean A Convenient Solution for Overflowing Kitchen Drawers and Countertop Clutter 360°Rotating Base: The utensil holder has "lazy susan" functionality so you can quickly spin the bucket to find the tool you need. Free up Your Drawer Space: DOWAN kitchen utensil holder can store whisks, spatulas, and other cooking utensils within reach without cluttering the countertop. Lazy Susan Caddy 7.6″ Large for 20+ Cooking Utensils Weighted Bottom and No tip over Easy to Clean with Only A Cloth

STEADY AND STURDY Nothing is more frustrating than having your utensils tip over while cooking. This ceramic kitchen utensil holder is heavy and stable, avoiding utensils from falling and spilling all over the kitchen. EASY ACCESS Because our utensil holder fully rotates, you can keep it tucked away on your counter. Save specious counter space while simultaneously being able to reach your utensils on the fly! CLEANING IS A BREEZE Other stainless steel utensil holders can rust and stain your counters with ugly spots over time, however, this ceramic utensil organizer is rust-proof. With its smooth glaze, you can just wipe it with a wet cloth. Clean as new!
6.2 x 7.2 inches 6.2 x 7.2 inches 6.2 x 7.6 inches 6.2 x 7.2 inches 6.2 x 7.2 inches 6.2 x 7.2 inches Table-protection Cork Mat ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Tip-over/Scratch Resistant ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Practical and attractive
reviews.reviewText: This is a very sturdy item that easily holds many utensils. It sits near our cooktop on our kitchen eat-in bar, which is why its aesthetics were important. The neutral colors will coordinate with most decors. We love that it rotates smoothly and easily so that we can quickly view/select items to use while cooking. This Christmas gifted it to others who had seen and admired ours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Utensil Holder!
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I was hoping for. Perfect size and quality, love that it turns effortlessly and is sturdy. The wood trim is a nice touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the best utensil holder I've ever had. And I've had a few. Lol. It's large to fit everything that I need while cooking. Color is perfect and love that it turns. Very sturdy. I just wish they had other kitchen accessories that went to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The color is true to the picture, and was pleased with the quality. Love that it spins which add to the convenience, and it's a perfect size. Would definitely recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it, except...
reviews.reviewText: I think this is very nicely made. I love the blue color. My only complaint is that the wood is not solid in color like the one pictured. See photos. Mine is 2 toned wood. Not really a big deal, but would have preferred a solid look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Utensil Holder (Blue)
reviews.reviewText: This was purchased as a gift. The recipient really liked it. It is a very nice glazed ceramic holder. It rotates on a wooden base. Seems like it will work well. I was a little surprised at the size, it is larger than it appeared. It should hold quite a few utensils and it seems very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute addition to the countertop
reviews.reviewText: Nice quality. The swivel feature is nice. Great buy for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love that it spins.
reviews.reviewText: I've had it for alittle while now and really like it. Spins nice and seems well built. Love the color and size.
